trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Birmingham
There were no other sightings in Birmingham on or around September 14th 2007
divs: sighting detailstravelling along the motorway - m42 heading north, we passed kingsbury oil refineary. just south of the oil terminal we saw distinctly and clearly in the sky 10-12 glowing orange\amber spheres. they appeared stationary. an aircraft approached and passed close over them and the lights moved closer together. aircraft lights presumably from birmingham international airport which is close by and has its approach path to the south,circled the lights and must have seen them. i was travelling with my wife who watched the lights untill we left them in the distance. my reaction remains that they were clearly distinct from the aircraft which were in the sky at the time, but i am unclear what they were other than lights. there was no camera in the car to take photo's but i'm sure the aircraft would have seen the lights and the radar at birmingham would have picked them up.
Summary: Group of small bright Orange/Amber lights
